title: B-Bop's
text:
B-Bop's is a double <a href="drive-thru">drive-thru</a> 1950s themed restaurant, with franchise locations in <a href="Iowa">Iowa</a>.
History.
B-Bop's was created by Bob Johnson in 1988. The first B-Bop's was located at 1500 E Euclid, Des Moines, Iowa. That location has now been demolished after Bob Johnson built a new B bops around the corner on E. 14th.
Today, there are eleven B-Bop's locations in Iowa, nine of which are in the Des Moines area along with two in Ames. A location in Cedar Rapids on Blair's Ferry Road was removed in the early 2000s
Awards.
B-Bop's has won <a href="Cityview%20%28Des%20Moines%29">Cityview</a>'s Best of Des Moines award in the category of Best Burger for twenty six years in a row. B-Bop's was also a runner-up for Best French Fry for Cityview's Best of Des Moines awards for the past five years and 2016 runner up for best hangover food.
